content.rendered: Entrepreneurial thinking lies at the heart of Millennium. Here Igor Tulchinsky, Founder, Chairman, Chief Executive Officer, Co-Chief Investment Officer and Head of Research, WorldQuant, speaks about his past as a game developer and how his entrepreneurial spirit led him to build WorldQuant.
